main.name: Brandon de Bruyn
main.description: I am a full stack developer and I use technologies like Angular, Ionic to develop innovating Micro Front-ends. Also creating Micro api services in asp.net C# and MS SQL
main.bio: Full Stack Developer, Bringing forth a motivated attitude and a variety of powerful skills. Committed to utilizing my skills to further the mission of a company. I'm also proficient in an assortment of technologies, including ASP.NET, C#, Typescript, Angular, SCSS, IONIC, and Microsoft SQL Server. Always learning new technologies to improve my knowledge.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Further Education and Training Certificate: Information Technology: Systems Development

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description: My Role was to setup, maintain and develop LUA scripts for a GTAV RP (Grand Theft Auto V Role-Play) called OriginX RP. I Worked well independently and on a team to solve problems. But mainly i worked independently. I independently had to configure the Rack Server for the server so People across South Africa could join the Game Server. I also had to setup a Team Speak server on Debian via ssh. I independently optimized the server to run a smooth 100+ FPS (Frames per second) with more than 100+ Players on at once.
